description: Adam Faust finds Mason Garet lying prey in a chain link spider web, his plump ass in the air begging for attention. Faust, a hairy fisting-top known for working his bottoms into a frenzy, steps up to feed Garet's hole. Moans of ecstasy fill the Eagle as Mason makes himself down on Adam's extended forearm, loosening him up for a relentless double-fist-pounding. Faust continues his job until he's rewarded by Garet's huge rosebud!
title: Spread Eagle, Scene #01
